pr_title: SAK-43273 - Group Manager - Manually added users are not a selectable option when auto-forming groups

timeline.bodyText: Looks like there's a label missing for this input. That makes it hard for people using screen readers or voice control to use the input.
timeline.author: accesslint
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -25,6 +25,7 @@
           <input type="hidden" th:field="*{groupNumberByGroup}" name="groupNumberByGroup">
           <input type="hidden" th:field="*{groupTitleByUser}" name="sgroupTitleByUser">
           <input type="hidden" th:field="*{groupNumberByUser}" name="groupNumberByUser">
+          <input type="hidden" th:field="*{useManuallyAddedUsers}" name="useManuallyAddedUsers">

replies.bodyText: Hidden does not need a label
replies.author: bjones86
